meanings.definition: A person who removes explosive mines or other dangerous objects.
meanings.sent1: The deminer carefully disarmed the explosive mine.
meanings.sent2: The deminer is a brave individual who risks their life to keep others safe.
meanings.sent3: The deminer joked that their job was like playing a dangerous game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: Watching the deminer work felt like witnessing a real-life hero in action.
meanings.sent5: The deminer's job requires immense skill and courage.

meanings.definition: To remove explosive mines or other dangerous objects.
meanings.sent1: The team will demine the area before it is safe for civilians to return.
meanings.sent2: It is crucial to demine the battlefield to prevent any accidents.
meanings.sent3: The demining process can be slow and meticulous to ensure safety.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a deminer carefully navigating through a field of hidden dangers.
meanings.sent5: The volunteers worked tirelessly to demine the area and make it secure.
